title: Sauerkraut Rye Bread
ingredients: ['235g sauerkraut - rinsed and drained', '180ml warm water', '1 1/2 tablespoons treacle', '1 1/2 tablespoons butter', '1 1/2 tablespoons dark brown sugar', '1 teaspoon caraway seeds', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '100g rye flour', '275g bread flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons dried active baking yeast']
